Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spInventory_GetAll] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin
set nocount on SELECT Id,ProductName,[Description],RetailPrice,QuantityInStock, IsTaxable FROM dbo.Product order by ProductName; end
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spProduct_GetAll] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin
set nocount on
SELECT Id,ProductName,[Description],RetailPrice,QuantityInStock, IsTaxable FROM dbo.Product where Id=@Id;
end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin SELECT [s].[SaleDate], [s].[SubTotal], [s].[Tax], [s].[Total], [u].[FirstName], [u].[LastName], [u].[EmailAdress] from dbo.Sale s inner join dbo.[User] u on s.CashierId=u.Id; end
